name: collectionView(_:namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination:forDraggedItemsAt:)
desc: Returns the names of the promised files that you created for a drag operation.
declaration:

namesOfPromisedFilesDroppedAtDestination dropURL: URL, 
           forDraggedItemsAt indexPaths: Set<IndexPath>) -> [String]
